Get Category.description: Returns an object with a getValue method which will return the integer value of the business process flow category.

Get Entity Name.description: Returns the logical name of the entity associated with the stage.

Get Id.description: Returns the unique identifier of the stage.

Get Name.description: Returns the name of the stage.

Get Navigation Behavior.description: Returns a navigation behavior object for a stage that can be used to define whether the Create button is available for users to create other entity record in a cross-entity business process flow navigation scenario.

Get Status.description: Returns the status of the stage.

Get Steps.description: Returns a collection of steps in the stage.
